Text: RAR's really suck and there's really no need for them.

@raindrops---while it could be argued that 7zip might be a better choice than winrar, compressed files actually do serve many purposes. This is a prim example: putting a bunch of files together for one SIMPLE download. Also, if the person has slow speeds for uploading, a compressed collection may prove more practical than uploading a bunch of files. It pays to think these things through before whining...
If yer gonna pack a stack of files in a compressed format, at least list the contents.
around 57 books are there that's why i rar them brother
no reason to rar them at all. piratebay can handle a torrent with 57 files, no problem!
